conversations.conversation:
;http://www.selleckbio.com/srt1720-S1129.html;
;
;A selective activator of human SIRT1. Order SRT1720 from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://www.selleckbio.com/sp600125-S1460.html;
;
;SP600125 is a JNK inhibitor with IC50=40 nM for JNK-1 and JNK-2 and 90 nM for JNK-3. Order SP600125 from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://www.selleckbio.com/sns-032-S1145.html;
;
;SNS-032 (BMS-387032) is a potent, selective cyclin-dependent kinases (CDK) 9, 7 and 2 inhibitor with IC50 of 4, 62 and 38 nM for CDK9, CDK2/cyclin A and CDK7/Cyclin H. Order SNS-032 (BMS-387032) from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://www.selleckbio.com/sgx-523-S1112.html;
;
;SGX-523 is an exquisitely selective, ATP-competitive MET receptor tyrosine kinase inhibitor with IC50 of 4 nM for the inhibition of HGFR. Order SGX-523 from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://www.selleckbio.com/vx-222-S1480.html;
;
;VX-222 is a small molecule non-nucleoside inhibitor of HCV NS5B polymerase that is being investigated for the treatment of hepatitis C virus infection. Order VX-222 from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://www.selleckbio.com/sgi-1776-S2198.html;
;
;SGI-1776 is a selective Pim family kinase inhibitor with IC50 of 7 ± 1.8, 363 ± 27.6 and 69 ± 9.2 nM for Pim-1, Pim-2 and Pim-3 ★ Order SGI-1776 from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://www.selleckbio.com/semagacestat-ly450139-S1594.html;
;
;Semagacestat (LY450139) is a γ-secretase blocker with an IC50 of 15 nM. Order Semagacestat (LY450139) from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://www.selleckbio.com/vicriviroc-malate-S2004.html;
;
;Vicriviroc is a CCR5(cellular coreceptor 5) inhibitor, in vitro activity against HIV (IC9013 nM). Order Vicriviroc from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://www.selleckbio.com/sb939-S1515.html;
;
;SB939 is a novel potent and orally active histone deacetylase inhibitor with an IC50 of 52 nM for HDAC1 and a GI50 of 0.56 μM for Colo205. Order from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://www.selleckbio.com/sb590885-S2220.html;
;
;SB590885 is a novel, potent and selective small molecule B-Raf kinase inhibitor with Ki app of 0.16 ± 0.03 nM. ★ Order SB590885 from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://www.selleckbio.com/sb-743921-S2182.html;
;
;SB743921 is a second generation, highly potent and active KSP inhibitor with Ki of 0.1 nM for KSP (Eg5) ★ Order SB743921 from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://www.selleckbio.com/sb-525334-S1476.html;
;
;SB 525334 is a selective inhibitor of transforming growth factor-β receptor I (ALK5, TGF-βRI) (IC50 = 14.3 nM). Order SB 525334 from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://www.selleckbio.com/vatalanib-S1101.html;
;
;Vatalanib (PTK787) is a novel VEGFR and c-Kit tyrosine kinases and angiogenesis inhibitor with IC50 of 0.037, 0.077, 0.27 and 0.73 μM for KDR, Flt-1, Flk and c-Kit, respectively. Order Vatalanib (PTK787) from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://selleck.cn/tgf-smad.html;
;
;Inhibitors, Antibodies and siRNAs targeting TGF-beta/Smad are available at Selleck. Check TGF-beta pathway reviews and assay information.

;http://selleck.cn/gamma-secretase.html;
;
;Inhibitors, Antibodies and siRNAs targeting Gamma Secretase are available at Selleck. Check Secretase pathway reviews and assay information.

;http://selleck.cn/hedgehog-pathway.html;
;
;Inhibitors, Antibodies and siRNAs on Hedgehog pathway are available at Selleck. Check Hedgehog reviews and assay information.

;http://selleck.cn/calcium-ca-channel.html;
;
;Inhibitors, Antibodies and siRNAs on Calcium Channel pathway are available at Selleck. Check Ca Channel signaling reviews and assay information.

;http://selleck.cn/sodium-na-channel.html;
;
;Inhibitors, Antibodies and siRNAs on Sodium Channel pathway are available at Selleck. Check Na Channel signaling reviews and assay information.

;http://selleck.cn/atpase.html;
;
;Inhibitors, Antibodies and siRNAs on Cell ATPase pathway are available at Selleck. Check Adenosinetriphosphatase signaling reviews and assay information.

;http://selleck.cn/abeta.html;
;
;Inhibitors, Antibodies and siRNAs on Cell Beta Amyloid pathway are available at Selleck. Check A beta signaling reviews and assay information.

;http://www.selleckbio.com/av-951-S1207.html;
;
;Tivozanib (AV-951) is an orally bioavailable potent VEGFR-1, 2 and 3, c-Kit and PDGFR inhibitor with IC50 of 0.21, 0.16, 0.24, 1.63 and 1.72 nM, respectively. Order AV-951(Tivozani; from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://www.selleckbio.com/tg100-115-S1352.html;
;
;TG100–115 is a PI3K γ and -δ inhibitor (IC50 = 83 and 235 nM, respectively). Order TG100-115 from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://www.selleckbio.com/staurosporine-S1421.html;
;
;Staurosporine is a prototypical potent ATP-competitive kinase inhibitor with IC50 of 0.7, 7, 8.5, 6, 20 nM for PKC, PKA,PKG, p60v-src tyrosine protein kinase, CaM kinase II, respectively. Order Staurosporine from supplier Selleck for research use only.

;http://selleck.cn/wnt-pathway.html;
;
;Inhibitors, Antibodies and siRNAs on Wnt pathway are available at Selleck. Check Wnt / beta-catenin reviews and assay information.
